metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33061 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient control flow management for the Intel(R) 82599 EthernetControllers and Adapters may allow an authenticated user to potentiallyenable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
